name: vault-worktree
description: Automate Vault development workflow with fast version switching and branch management using git worktrees. Reduces manual version changes from 20-40 minutes to <5 seconds.

features.commands: Available for v1.x compatibility (v2.x use skills)
features.skills: Primary interface for v2.x - ask Claude to switch versions or branches
features.hooks: PreToolUse validation to prevent cross-version file edits
